      Special Action that allows Actors to drop items.
      class  MoveActorAction

      Action to allow items to be picked up.

    • Uses of Action in game

      Subclasses of Action in game 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AimerAction
      An action that will aim at a target with a selected gun.
      class  AttackAction
      An action for attacking other Actors.
      class  BuyAction
      An action for buying an item with coins
      class  ChantSpawnAction
      An action for spawning new zombies in random locations
      class  ChooseAimAction
      MenuAction that chooses who to aim at and increments the aim level.
      class  ChooseShootTargetAction
      Action that presents a sub menu to choose an actor to shoot at with a sniper.
      class  CollectCoinsAction
      An action for picking up coins from the ground (can do multiple at a time)
      class  CraftAction
      An action for crafting a CraftableItem into a different item
      class  DoNothingCustomMessageAction
      An action to do nothing, with a custom description of that action
      class  EatAction
      An action for eating food.
      class  EndLifeAction
      An action for instantly killing a actor
      class  FarmerHarvestAction
      Class for Farmer Harvesting, rather than the item going into inventory it instead goes on the ground
      class  FertiliseAction
      Class for the action that fertilises a crop
      class  HarvestAction
      An abstract class for harvesting a crop.
      class  HumanHarvestAction
      Class for regular human's Harvesting, where the food is added to the actors inventory
      class  ReloadAction
      Action that is used to relaod a gun
      class  SetUpTurretAction
      Sets up a turret.
      class  ShootAction
      This is an action class that shoots either a target or group of targets and then decreases the ammunition in the gun
      class  ShopAction
      An action for shopping at a shop
      class  SowAction
      Action class for sowing a crop, will change the ground from dirt to crop.
      class  ToggleAction
      An action to toggle a Toggleable object
      class  UseGunAction
      Action for shotgun that displays the submenu for shotgun.
